Code:
EXEC SQL  SELECT value(sum(h.val_operacao)0)
FROM seguros.v0sinistro_auto1
 
where a.num_Apolice        =  :NUM_APOLICE
  and a.num_item           =  :NUM_ITEM
  and a.ramo               =  :RAMO
  and m.num_Apol_sinistro  =  a.num_Apol_sinistro
  and m.situacao          <>  '2'
  and h.num_Apol_sinistro  =  a.num_Apol_sinistro
  and h.operacao          in  (1181,1182,1183,1184)
  and h.situacao          <>  '2'
/
 END SQL
